body_html: We also have "MKL for Linux and Windows" in the roadmap. The build will be SSE-based and will use MKL dynamic SIMD dispatch to leverage AVX or AVX2 when it's present. This is likely to happen before dynamic loading of SIMD-optimized kernels.
body_text: We also have "MKL for Linux and Windows" in the roadmap. The build will be SSE-based and will use MKL dynamic SIMD dispatch to leverage AVX or AVX2 when it's present. This is likely to happen before dynamic loading of SIMD-optimized kernels.
body: We also have "MKL for Linux and Windows" in the roadmap. The build will be SSE-based and will use MKL dynamic SIMD dispatch to leverage AVX or AVX2 when it's present. This is likely to happen before dynamic loading of SIMD-optimized kernels.
